name: Cinderella 2: The Harbinger of Death
description:
Zombified woodland creatures are coming to kill Cinderella. She has other plans. 

Made in 72 hours for the Indie Tales Game Jam 2021 (Theme - One Room). 

Controls / How to play:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move.
  • Hold left mouse button to attack.
  • Use mouse cursor to aim.
  • Click the top right button to advance to the next round.
  • Hold right mouse button to mop. 
  • Enemies are powered up when standing in blood. 
  • Hold down mop over blood to collect. It could come in handy. 
  • Blood evaporates after a short time. 

All code, art, sound, and music (apologies) created by me. 

Technically the music is a chiptune cover I made of "Look Who's Inside Again" by Bo Burnham but it is not good to the point that it is nearly unrecognizable so I consider it an original. 

Font credits: Alagard by Hewett Tsoi https://www.dafont.com/alagard.font
